title: Documentation Portal
description: A modern, fast, and beautiful documentation portal built with Next.js

content.text: A modern, fast, and beautiful documentation portal built with Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. Perfect for creating comprehensive documentation for your projects.

items: ğŸš€ Built with Next.js 14 and App Router
ğŸ’ Beautiful UI with Tailwind CSS and shadcn/ui
âœ¨ Syntax highlighting for code blocks

content.text: Get started with the documentation portal in just a few steps ([Google](https://www.google.com)):

content.title: Installation
content.code:
# Clone the repository
git clone https://github.com/your-username/docs-portal.git

# Install dependencies
npm install

# Start development server
npm run dev

content.text: This documentation portal uses a JSON-based content management system. Each page is defined as a JSON file in the `data/content` directory with structured content blocks.

content.title: ğŸ’¡ Getting Started
content.text: Check out the Installation guide to set up your documentation portal, or explore the Quick Start guide to understand the project structure.
